IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: At The Speyer Legacy School, students are inspired to be intellectually curious and passionate. They realize their full potential as accelerated learners in a collaborative community that is committed to ethical values and action. (Contd Schedule O)
IRS990.MissionDesc: At The Speyer Legacy School, students are inspired to be intellectually curious and passionate. They realize their full potential as accelerated learners in a collaborative community that is committed to ethical values and action. (Contd Schedule O)
IRS990.Desc: The Speyer Legacy School was founded in 2009 as a non-profit institution. The Organizations mission is to provide an optimal environment where advanced learners may realize their full potential in the company of both exceptional classmates and teachers who share, and will foster, their passion for learning.Speyer is dedicated to cultivating both intellect and integrity in equal measure. Children will enter with a wide range of interests, strengths, challenges and perspectives. It is the Schools goal that they leave more confident and developed in their individuality.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Other revenues included on Form 990 (Part XI, line 4b)
Other expenses included on Form 990 (Part XII, line 4b)
Footnote for uncertain tax position under FIN 48 (Part X)
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization is exempt from income taxes under Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code, and is not a private organization within the meaning of Section 590(a).Management has evaluated the Organizations tax positions in regards to accounting for uncertainty in income taxes and concluded that the Organization had taken no uncertain tax positions that require adjustment to the financial statements to comply with the provisions of this guidance. With few exceptions, the Organization is no longer subject to income tax examinations by the U.S. federal, state, or local tax authorities for years before 2020.
During the fiscal year the Organization received financial assitance from government sources the Non Public School NYS Loan Program.

It is the policy of Organization not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age or disability in its educational programs and its related policies and procedures.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990 governing body review Part VI line 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The 990 form and the related schedules are provided to and reviewed by the full board after finance committee approval as well as management prior to submittal to the respective tax agencies.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Conflict of interest policy compliance Part VI line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: All board members as well as key employees and management are required to annually read and confirm in writing they have no conflicts of interest or otherwise disclose them and to immediately disclose any relationship that may potentially give rise to a conflict of interest. The finance committee is responsible for reviewing any issues that arise.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: CEO executive director top management comp Part VI line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A separate committee of the board evaluates the Head of School and recommends compensation. Remainder of senior administration is approved through the budget process which is evaluated and reviewed annually.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Other officer or key employee compensation Part VI line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: All compensation for key personnel is approved through the budget process by the board of directors which is evaluated and reviewed annually.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Governing documents etc available to public Part VI line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization makes available its governing documents, conflict of interest policy and other policies and procedures upon request. The financial statements are also made available upon request. The 990 filing and the related schedules are made available upon request and can also be found on Guidestar.com, which is an independent entity that makes available via their website certain nonprofit information including but not limited to the Form 990.
Form 990, Part I, Line 1) Speyer students learn with like-minded classmates and are guided by academically fearless teachers who share and nourish their enthusiasm for knowledge and inquiry.
